desc: Permanent and Semi-permanent Makeup by Biotouch Inc.

layout.text:
• Interchangeable head and Secure!
• Finer needles, 0.2-0.22mm, for more natural hair stroke
• Threaded Needle head are easy to change & stay securely
• New U shape needle - Able to make free degree curved lines
• Ergonomic designed to promote steadier and quality design strokes
• High grade stainless steel material
